title: Evaluating the effects of manual hoeing and selective herbicides on maize (Zea mays L.) productivity and profitability
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Mick Assani Bin Lukangila, Hugues Ilunga Tabu, David Bugeme Mugisho, Antoine Kanyenga Lubobo, Adrien Kalonji Mbuyi Wa Mbombo
